targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  timestamp AS "time",
  tvl as "TVL"
FROM bsc_pool_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT 
  timestamp AS "time",
  pool_ratio * 100 as "BTCB Ratio %"
FROM bsc_pool_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT 
  timestamp AS "time",
  price_btcb_usdt as "BTCB Price"
FROM bsc_pool_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT 
  timestamp AS "time",
  gini_coefficient as "Gini"
FROM token_distribution
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT 
  timestamp AS "time",
  tvl as "TVL"
FROM bsc_pool_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT 
  timestamp AS "time",
  token0_reserve as "BTCB",
  token1_reserve as "USDT"
FROM bsc_pool_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT 
  timestamp AS "time",
  price_btcb_usdt as "BTCB/USDT Price"
FROM bsc_pool_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT 
  timestamp AS "time",
  pool_ratio * 100 as "BTCB Ratio",
  (1 - pool_ratio) * 100 as "USDT Ratio"
FROM bsc_pool_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT 
  timestamp as "Timestamp",
  tvl as "TVL",
  price_btcb_usdt as "Price",
  token0_reserve as "BTCB",
  token1_reserve as "USDT",
  pool_ratio * 100 as "Ratio %"
FROM bsc_pool_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 100
SELECT total_holders FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT top10_supply_percent FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT whales FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT holder_change_24h FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT holders_by_swap FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT shrimps FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT current_usd_price FROM moralis_pair_stats_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT total_liquidity_usd FROM moralis_pair_stats_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT price_change_24h FROM moralis_pair_stats_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT total_volume_24h FROM moralis_pair_stats_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
  timestamp as time,
  total_holders as "Total Holders",
  net_holder_change as "Net Change"
FROM moralis_historical_holders_correct
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT 
  'Whales' as category, whales as count
FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct
WHERE timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct)
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Sharks', sharks FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct WHERE timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct)
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Dolphins', dolphins FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct WHERE timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct)
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Fish', fish FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct WHERE timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct)
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Octopus', octopus FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct WHERE timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct)
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Crabs', crabs FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct WHERE timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct)
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Shrimps', shrimps FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct WHERE timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM moralis_holder_stats_correct)

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('hour', block_timestamp) as time,
  SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'buy' THEN total_value_usd ELSE 0 END) as "Buy Volume",
  SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'sell' THEN total_value_usd ELSE 0 END) as "Sell Volume"
FROM moralis_swaps_correct
WHERE block_timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  transaction_type as "Type",
  wallet_address_label as "Wallet Label",
  entity as "Entity",
  pair_label as "Pair",
  exchange_name as "Exchange",
  total_value_usd as "Value USD",
  block_timestamp as "Time"
FROM moralis_swaps_correct
WHERE wallet_address_label IS NOT NULL OR entity IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC
LIMIT 20
SELECT total_buy_volume_24h FROM moralis_token_analytics_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT total_sell_volume_24h FROM moralis_token_analytics_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT total_buyers_24h FROM moralis_token_analytics_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT total_sellers_24h FROM moralis_token_analytics_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
  timestamp as time,
  total_buyers_24h as "Buyers",
  total_sellers_24h as "Sellers",
  total_buys_24h as "Buy Transactions",
  total_sells_24h as "Sell Transactions"
FROM moralis_token_analytics_correct
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  wallet_address as "Wallet",
  avg_buy_price_usd as "Avg Buy",
  avg_sell_price_usd as "Avg Sell",
  count_of_trades as "Trades",
  realized_profit_usd as "Realized Profit",
  total_usd_invested as "Total Invested"
FROM moralis_top_gainers
ORDER BY realized_profit_usd DESC
LIMIT 20

options.content: # 🚀 Moralis Rich Data Analytics - BTCB/USDT on BSC

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  block_timestamp as "Time",
  transaction_type as "Type",
  SUBSTRING(wallet_address, 1, 6) || '...' || SUBSTRING(wallet_address, LENGTH(wallet_address) - 3) as "Wallet",
  wallet_address_label as "Label",
  entity as "Entity",
  CASE 
    WHEN transaction_type = 'buy' THEN bought_name
    ELSE sold_name
  END as "Token",
  bought_amount as "Bought Amount",
  bought_usd_amount as "Bought USD",
  sold_amount as "Sold Amount",
  sold_usd_amount as "Sold USD",
  total_value_usd as "Total USD",
  exchange_name as "Exchange",
  pair_label as "Pair",
  transaction_hash as "Tx Hash"
FROM moralis_swaps_correct
ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC
LIMIT 50

SELECT
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY balance DESC) as "Rank",
  holder_address as "Holder Address",
  balance_formatted as "Balance",
  balance_formatted * 113000 as "USD Value",
  percentage_of_supply as "% of Supply",
  holder_type as "Type"
FROM moralis_holders
ORDER BY balance DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  SUBSTRING(wallet_address, 1, 6) || '...' || SUBSTRING(wallet_address, LENGTH(wallet_address) - 3) as "Wallet",
  COUNT(*) as "Trades",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'buy' THEN 1 END) as "Buys",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'sell' THEN 1 END) as "Sells",
  SUM(total_value_usd) as "Total Volume",
  AVG(total_value_usd) as "Avg Trade Size",
  COALESCE(wallet_address_label, entity, 'Unknown') as "Identity",
  SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'buy' THEN bought_usd_amount ELSE -sold_usd_amount END) as "Net Flow"
FROM moralis_swaps_correct
GROUP BY wallet_address, wallet_address_label, entity
ORDER BY "Total Volume" DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT
  block_timestamp as "Time",
  SUBSTRING(from_address, 1, 8) || '...' as "From",
  SUBSTRING(to_address, 1, 8) || '...' as "To",
  value / POWER(10, 18) as "Amount",
  (value / POWER(10, 18)) * 113000 as "Value",
  transaction_hash as "Tx Hash"
FROM moralis_transfers
ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT 
  exchange_name as name,
  SUM(total_value_usd) as volume
FROM moralis_swaps_correct
WHERE exchange_name IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY exchange_name
ORDER BY volume DESC

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN bought_name = 'BTCB Token' THEN sold_name
    ELSE bought_name
  END as name,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM moralis_swaps_correct
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT MAX(total_value_usd) FROM moralis_swaps_correct

SELECT
  timestamp as time,
  holders_in_whales as "Whales In",
  -holders_out_whales as "Whales Out",
  holders_in_sharks as "Sharks In",
  -holders_out_sharks as "Sharks Out",
  holders_in_dolphins as "Dolphins In",
  -holders_out_dolphins as "Dolphins Out"
FROM moralis_historical_holders_correct
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp as time,
  total_holders as "Total Holders",
  net_holder_change as "Net Change",
  new_holders_by_swap as "New via Swaps",
  new_holders_by_transfer as "New via Transfer"
FROM moralis_historical_holders_correct
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
ORDER BY timestamp
